00020 #include "ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint.h"

00024 
00025 void ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXf &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate, bool &modelFound){
00026 
00027         std::vector<int> samples;
00028         std::vector<int> selection;
00029         getSamples(iterations,selection);
00030 
00031         if (selection.size () == 0){
00032                 isDegenerate = false;
00033                 modelFound = false;
00034                 return;
00035         } else {
00036 
00037                 isDegenerate = true;
00038 
00039         }
00040 
00041         if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00042                 modelFound = false;
00043                 return;
00044         } else {
00045                 modelFound = true;
00046                 return;
00047         }
00048 
00049 }

00051 
00052 void ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint::getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples){
00053 
00054 //      points = inputPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00055 
00056         samples.resize (4);
00057         double trand = inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00058 
00059         // Get a random number between 1 and max_indices
00060         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00061         // Get the index
00062         samples[0] = idx;
00063 
00064         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00065         do
00066         {
00067                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00068                 samples[1] = idx;
00069                 iterations++;
00070         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00071         iterations--;
00072         // Get the values at the two points
00073         Eigen::Vector4f p0, p1, p2;
00074         // SSE friendly data check
00075         p1 = Eigen::Vector4f ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00076         p0 = Eigen::Vector4f ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00077 
00078         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p1 and p0
00079         p1 -= p0;
00080 
00081         Eigen::Vector4f dy1dy2;
00082         int iter = 0;
00083         do
00084         {
00085                 // Get the third point, different from the first two
00086                 do
00087                 {
00088                         idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00089                         samples[2] = idx;
00090                         iterations++;
00091                 } while ( (samples[2] == samples[1]) || (samples[2] == samples[0]) );
00092                 iterations--;
00093 
00094                 // SSE friendly data check
00095                 p2 = Eigen::Vector4f ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getZ(), 0);
00096 
00097                 // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p2 and p0
00098                 p2 -= p0;
00099 
00100 #ifdef EIGEN3
00101                 dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00102 #else
00103                 dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00104 #endif
00105                 ++iter;
00106                 if (iter > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR )
00107                 {
00108                         cout<<"[SampleConsensusModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select 3 non collinear points in"<<  MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR <<"iterations!";
00109                         break;
00110                 }
00111                 iterations++;
00112         }
00113         while ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) && (dy1dy2[2] == dy1dy2[1]) );
00114         iterations--;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 bool
00119 ObjectModelPlaneFromLineAndPoint::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &sample,
00120                 Eigen::VectorXf &modelCoefficients){
00121 
00122         line line1,line2;
00123 
00124         //Create line1 from sample[0] and sample[1]
00125         line1.pbase = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]];
00126         line1.director.resize(3);
00127         line1.director[0]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getX() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]].getX();
00128         line1.director[1]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getY() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]].getY();
00129         line1.director[2]=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getZ() - (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[0]].getZ();
00130 
00131         //Compute the model coefficients
00132 
00133         double dx1=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getX()-line1.pbase.getX();
00134         double dy1=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getY()-line1.pbase.getY();
00135         double dz1=(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[1]].getZ()-line1.pbase.getZ();
00136 
00137         modelCoefficients.resize(4);
00138 
00139         modelCoefficients[0]=dy1*line1.director[2]-dz1*line1.director[1];
00140         modelCoefficients[1]=dz1*line1.director[0]-dx1*line1.director[2];
00141         modelCoefficients[2]=dx1*line1.director[1]-dy1*line1.director[0];
00142 
00143         if (abs(modelCoefficients[0])<geometryEpsilon&&abs(modelCoefficients[1])<
00144                         geometryEpsilon&&abs(modelCoefficients[2])<geometryEpsilon){
00145                 cout<<"Point is contained in the line"<<endl;
00146                 return false;
00147         }
00148         modelCoefficients[3]=-modelCoefficients[0]*(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getX()-
00149                         modelCoefficients[1]*(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getY()-
00150                         modelCoefficients[2]*(*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[sample[2]].getZ();
00151 
00152         return true;
00153 }
00154 
00155 }
